Welcome to Eden Valley Farm! 

Eden Valley Farm was founded in 1962 in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Loveland, Colorado. 

Although the produce at Eden Valley Farm cannot be labelled as “Organic”, it is pesticide and chemical free. Pests are handled with crop rotations and companion planting. Farm workers also handle pests by hand. 

These time tested traditions are why our farmer’s say that our produce is “Better than Organic”. A person only has to wander through the lush greenhouses replete with its own bees to know there is something very special happening there.

 Come, be a part of our Eden Valley Farm family!
